revision.text:
{{DISPLAYTITLE:A_KBoltRaise}} '''A_KBoltRaise'''
If the ceiling is still 96 map units or higher above the calling actor, spawns a new {{Class|KoraxBolt}} at the same X and Y coordinates as the calling actor, but 48 map units higher, and sets the newly created bolt's {{c|special1}} field to 3. (This value is used by [[A_KBolt]] to control when to destroy the actor.)
This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|KoraxBolt}} and derived classes.
{{DEFAULTSORT:KBoltRaise}}[[Category:Decorate Spawn functions]] [[Category:Decorate Hexen functions]] [[Category:Decorate Restricted functions]]
